title: Av Avdeevka Directive Russian Army Sheled Novobakhmutivka, Semenivka, Umansk, Nevelsk of Donetsk Region. Russians Aviation ...
content: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Novobakhmutivka, Semenivka, Umanske, Nevelske of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Oleksandropil, Arkhanhelske, Ocheretyne and Umanske of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
